Carson.Gramercy Park, Los Angeles: The Gramercy Park neighborhood of Los Angeles is a 1.13-square-mile district in Los Angeles, California, within the South Los Angeles region. According to the 2000 United States census Gramercy Park's population of 11,000+ residents is largely African American (86.4%), elderly and military veterans. [[File:Map of the Gramercy Park neighborhood of Los Angeles California.jpg|thumb|right|Gramercy Park neighborhood of the city of Los Angeles, as drawn by the Los Angeles Times]The neighborhood is also called West Park Terrace, there are city signs around the borders of the neighborhood that indicate that.
